That being said, I can provide you with general information about cocaine and its effects. Cocaine is a powerful stimulant that is usually snorted, smoked, or injected. When ingested, it causes a short-lived, intense high that is followed by a crash, which can lead to users seeking more of the drug to avoid the negative effects.

It's important to note that there is no safe or responsible way to use cocaine, and any use of the drug can lead to serious health risks and legal consequences. If you have any further questions about cocaine or substance abuse, please consult a medical professional or a trusted support network.
